segments.text: Can you effect shipment during September ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think we can make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then when at the earliest can we expect the shipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's too late . You see , in our market October is the season for the kind of commodity . So the goods must be shipped before October or we won't be ready for the season .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , considering our long standing good business relationship , we'll try hard to negotiate with our manufacturers for an earlier delivery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Then may I suggest that you put down in the contract ' shipment on September 15 or earlier ' ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Now the workers will have to work on three shifts for it . Well , we can manage it on 20th September . That's the best we can do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's very considerate of you . I'lI take your word for it .
segments.speaker: S1
